title.en: Shattered Equilibrium in the Monochrome Void

description.ko: 경직된 기하학적 구조와 디지털 엔트로피의 교차점을 탐구하며, 파편의 혼돈 속에서 완벽한 균형을 찾아냅니다.
description.en: A study on the intersection of rigid geometry and digital entropy, finding a perfect balance within the chaos of fragments.

prompt: A brutalist #1A1A1A obsidian tower disintegrating into a torrent of sharp geometric shards and #C0C0C0 vertical scanline glitches against a stark #FFFFFF void. The composition features high-contrast monochrome complexity with #808080 digital noise textures and raytraced reflections on the fragmented black glass surfaces. 8k resolution, Octane Render. Razor-sharp shadows emphasize the chaos within order, capturing the perfect balance created by fragments of a collapsing digital reality.
